Class ec.ifc.stonelook.SLPopup 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.application.View
           |
           +----netscape.application.Popup
                   |
                   +----ec.ifc.stonelook.SLPopup
public class SLPopup
extends Popup
implements HasColorScheme
Subclass of Popup that applies stone-texture look.

SLPopup()
Creates a new SLPopup with the stone-texture look.

drawView(Graphics)
Draws the inactive Popup.
getColorScheme()
Returns the color scheme for this popup -- one of the set specified by class StoneLook.
setColorScheme(int)
Sets the color scheme for this popup, and schedules a redraw.

SLPopup 
  public SLPopup()
Creates a new SLPopup with the stone-texture look. Callers generally won't have to modify the appearance further.

drawView 
  public void drawView(Graphics g)
Draws the inactive Popup.
Overrides:
drawView in class Popup
getColorScheme 
  public int getColorScheme()
Returns the color scheme for this popup -- one of the set specified by class StoneLook. The default is StoneLook.BLUES.
setColorScheme 
  public void setColorScheme(int newColorScheme)
Sets the color scheme for this popup, and schedules a redraw.
See Also:
getColorScheme
